modules.name: DataFetcher
modules.description: Responsible for retrieving stock data from external sources (e.g., APIs, files). Handles API requests, data parsing, and error handling related to data acquisition.

modules.name: Calculator
modules.description: Performs calculations on the fetched stock data. Includes functions for calculating moving averages, RSI, MACD, and other technical indicators.  Handles data validation and error conditions during calculations.

modules.name: Reporter
modules.description: Formats and presents the analysis results.  Handles output to console, files (CSV, JSON), and potentially generates basic visualizations.  Provides user-friendly reporting of key metrics.
